REUTERS.UNKNOWN: L f2525 reute u f BC-WESTERN-KANSAS-FEEDLO 04-07 0062

TEXT.TITLE: WESTERN KANSAS FEEDLOT CATTLE STDY/UP 0.50 - USDA
TEXT.BODY:
slaughter cattle steady to firm, instances up 0.50 dlr, in moderate trade amid good demand, usda said. sales confirmed on 3,100 steers and 3,700 heifers. week to date 27,100 head. steers - mostly choice 2-3 1150-1175 lbs 69.75-70.00. heifers - mostly choice 2-3 950-1050 lbs 68.50-68.75.
Reuter
